title: Losing series because league client bugging.
body:
Went to play a ranked game.
Game starts **->** Right into a bug splat   (Not too bad, happens sometimes)
Reconnect **->** Right into "Check your internet connection"   (again not so bad, it could happen every now and again)
Reconnect **->** Game is no longer there

Anyway I could maybe get some forgiveness, or some tips to make sure this happens the **LEAST** possible?

replies.body: If that game isn't showing up for you to reconnect to anymore, there's a pretty good chance that the entire game itself crashed. In that case, no worries, you won't end up getting any penalties for that match since it wasn't even able to be played.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OEAEGzbt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-08T22:51:37.750+0000)
>
> If that game isn't showing up for you to reconnect to anymore, there's a pretty good chance that the entire game itself crashed. In that case, no worries, you won't end up getting any penalties for that match since it wasn't even able to be played.

Well, I lost my series from that game. So I'm sure it was more my side's fault.
